website_summaries.verdict: All-natural dehydrated treat that only sources beef hearts from American-raised cattle.
pros: A dog treat that delivers lean protein to make it healthy for the dog
Has no added hormones or preservatives
Through the dehydration process, the beef heart maintains its natural color and flavor, so dogs will love the taste and chewy texture
cons: Some problems with quality control during the packaging process

customer_reviews.title: I found something similar in the Netherlands and searched for ...
customer_reviews.text: I found something similar in the Netherlands and searched for these when I returned home. My dog loves these beyond any other treat, and they're healthy. I emailed the Dutch company to see if there's was sold in the US because the NH doesn't allow the 'crap' we put in our food and dog food. The Dutch company emailed me back that their product is not sold in the US, but they suggested I try these and included the Amazon url for these.
customer_reviews.author: Issa

customer_reviews.title: Great to hydrate for training treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very fussy eater. I needed something really good and healthy too. this is a fabulous product. i hydrate this one and the beef liver one. put some pieces in water and leave overnight. when i want to use it, i cut them in small pieces with a scissors... adding a little to food and also used for training treats. works great. i highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CXC

customer_reviews.title: Entire Package Moldy - Again
customer_reviews.text: 3 times in row there was mold but I never had a problem before and my dog loves these so decided to let it slide and just throw away and reorder. Received this today. This would make my dog extremely ill. I'd be scared to even open and inhale this much less give this to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy O.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love this product. Apparently the smell, taste, & texture is really great to them, & they love the crunchiness. They are happy when they are eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Jefferies

customer_reviews.title: Old dog needs heart nutrition.
customer_reviews.text: Vet prescribed Taurine capsule twice a day. I give him one capsule and 1 or 2 duck hearts a day. I rated it 5 for flavor because he really likes these. Seeme to be his favorite treat.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and senior dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these several times for my friend's senior dog and he loves them. I feel good giving him a natural and healthy treat. Even being older, he's able to work on and soften the treats himself. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: dcc

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them and they are made from grass fed heart.
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves them, but they are very thin and not much in the package. They are Grass fed which is much better for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M Ogershok

customer_reviews.title: They’re crunchy.
customer_reviews.text: My pug likes these, but prefers the dehydrated chicken breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthiest of treats which your dog will LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats I every want to give my dogs ever again. They are on a raw diet so they need to eat hearts, kidneys, liver etc. I can give them as many treats as they want which I then just factor into their overall meal plan. The "girls" LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Goliath58

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs will do ANYTHING for this stuff. Really comes in handy when they get loose and won't come.
customer_reviews.author: bluesmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for price - maybe sent old merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be high-quality ingredients. But perhaps Amazon sent very old stock. Even with soaking, these are difficult to cut or break. I've previously bought a similar product locally without this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these, so I have it on ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, so I have it on "subscribe and save". But for the last two months, I noticed the entire package was full of mold with green spots all over the treats. Will not buy them again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Zhi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these beef hearts, and they are healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Luchie

product_meta.title: Chasing Our Tails Naturally Dehydrated Beef Heart For Pets, 5-Ounce
product_meta.description: Chasing Our Tails Dehydrated Beef Heart treats are formulated to appeal to dogs of ages, from training puppies to the older pet with dental issues. 100% organ or striated muscle that is hand-trimmed of extra fat, our treats are dehydrated and not freeze dried. This allows the treats to more accurately retain the natural color, smell and taste that dogs love. Sourced from USA grown animals our dehydrated products contain no fillers, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives.
feature_bullets: No Fillers, By-Products Or Animal Meals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
